SECTION_CONTENT:
Avoid contact with iron, iron salts, phosphorus, sulfur, oxygen, nickel and its alloys, chlorinated solvents, halogens, and heavy metals.
Reacts violently with water.
Shelf life: Indefinite, if stored safely. See Section 7 for further information.
